data.text:
On a holiday, I was taking a walk at the 
park when a voice called out to me.
data.processed:
<story>On a holiday, I was taking a walk at the 
<story>park when a voice called out to me.

data.text: Oh, Trainer-san.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Oh, Trainer-san.

data.text: Bumping in to you here is quite a coincidence, isn't it?～
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Bumping in to you here is quite a coincidence, isn't it?～

data.text:
Just wandering here and there aimlessly……you could call it a 
walk. I tend to spend most of my days off like this, you know?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Just wandering here and there aimlessly……you could call it a 
<story>walk. I tend to spend most of my days off like this, you know?

data.text:
My friends often tell me that I'm wasting a lot 
of time but, since I came from America, just walking 
and seeing the scenery is fulfilling.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>My friends often tell me that I'm wasting a lot 
<story>of time but, since I came from America, just walking 
<story>and seeing the scenery is fulfilling.

data.text:
Besides, even if it's a day off, I still want 
to move my body even just a little bit.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Besides, even if it's a day off, I still want 
<story>to move my body even just a little bit.

data.text:
While I'm moving my body, I can enjoy the atmosphere 
of this country…… you could say walking is a form 
of entertainment for me, you know?～
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>While I'm moving my body, I can enjoy the atmosphere 
<story>of this country…… you could say walking is a form 
<story>of entertainment for me, you know?～

data.text:
But well, I've already seen all around this area, 
so I'm not sure where I should go next time.
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: I could act as your guide

data.processed:
<story>But well, I've already seen all around this area, 
<story>so I'm not sure where I should go next time.

data.text:
Eh, to a place for a walk? 
I see, that's a good idea～
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Eh, to a place for a walk? 
<story>I see, that's a good idea～

data.text:
Maybe Trainer-san knows some scenery that 
I've never seen before, after all.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Maybe Trainer-san knows some scenery that 
<story>I've never seen before, after all.

data.text:
Fufu, in that case, I'll take you up on that offer. 
Let's take a leisurely stroll together!
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Fufu, in that case, I'll take you up on that offer. 
<story>Let's take a leisurely stroll together!

data.text:
So I chose a few places that Grass 
Wonder might not have known about.
data.processed:
<story>So I chose a few places that Grass 
<story>Wonder might not have known about.

data.text:
To think there was a teahouse here. 
I never knew～.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>To think there was a teahouse here. 
<story>I never knew～.

data.text:
Even with all these fancy shops lined up, 
they haven't forgotten to give it a well balanced feel.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Even with all these fancy shops lined up, 
<story>they haven't forgotten to give it a well balanced feel.

data.text:
Oh, they've even created such a 
large menu using my favorite matcha♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Oh, they've even created such a 
<story>large menu using my favorite matcha♪

data.text:
……But, it might have been a mistake learning about 
this place. The temptation of sweets…… hmmmmm～……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>……But, it might have been a mistake learning about 
<story>this place. The temptation of sweets…… hmmmmm～……

data.text:
And like that, I visited several places 
together with Grass Wonder―
data.processed:
<story>And like that, I visited several places 
<story>together with Grass Wonder―

data.text:
A nice, quiet walk is good, but a fun walk like this is good too, 
isn't it? It's the result of walking together.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>A nice, quiet walk is good, but a fun walk like this is good too, 
<story>isn't it? It's the result of walking together.

data.text: Trainer-san, where should we go next??
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san, where should we go next??

data.text:
When Grass Wonder asked, I looked around. 
The Game Center caught my eye.

choices.text: Want to see the Game Center?

data.processed:
<story>When Grass Wonder asked, I looked around. 
<story>The Game Center caught my eye.

data.text:
The Game Center, is it……? 
Hmmmmm～, I'm not too familiar with places like that……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>The Game Center, is it……? 
<story>Hmmmmm～, I'm not too familiar with places like that……

data.text:
When it comes to walks, I can't help but think that 
a leisurely stroll is more suited for a quieter place……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>When it comes to walks, I can't help but think that 
<story>a leisurely stroll is more suited for a quieter place……

data.text: A new discovery……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>A new discovery……

data.text:
That's true, every place we've seen up until now had 
several new discoveries to be made as well.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>That's true, every place we've seen up until now had 
<story>several new discoveries to be made as well.

data.text:
……I understand. It's not often I get to take 
a walk with Trainer-san, so let's go take a look.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>……I understand. It's not often I get to take 
<story>a walk with Trainer-san, so let's go take a look.

data.text: As I thought, it's quite lively, isn't it～?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>As I thought, it's quite lively, isn't it～?

data.text: Trainer-san, what kind of game is this?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san, what kind of game is this?

data.text: The game that Grass Wonder was curious about was a dance game.
data.processed: <story>The game that Grass Wonder was curious about was a dance game.

data.text:
So it's a game you play by stepping on these buttons, 
it kind of seems a little bit like a Winning Live, doesn't it?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>So it's a game you play by stepping on these buttons, 
<story>it kind of seems a little bit like a Winning Live, doesn't it?

data.text: Eh? You mean…… me?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Eh? You mean…… me?

data.text:
Hmmmm～…… well, I've done some dance training, 
so I should be able to play it……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Hmmmm～…… well, I've done some dance training, 
<story>so I should be able to play it……

data.text:
Understood, I'll give it a try. 
Don't laugh if I'm not very good at it, okay?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Understood, I'll give it a try. 
<story>Don't laugh if I'm not very good at it, okay?

data.text: And so, Grass Wonder started the game……
data.processed: <story>And so, Grass Wonder started the game……

data.text:
Hmm…… oh…… 
Ah, ah……!?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Hmm…… oh…… 
<story>Ah, ah……!?

data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: ……It didn't go anything like a Winning Live.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……It didn't go anything like a Winning Live.

data.text:
Ah, but it was an interesting game. 
It's also a good work out.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Ah, but it was an interesting game. 
<story>It's also a good work out.

data.text:
So there are games like this, huh～? 
I learned about a lot of things today.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>So there are games like this, huh～? 
<story>I learned about a lot of things today.

data.text:
This was also because we took a walk together. 
Trainer-san, thank you very much for accompanying me.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>This was also because we took a walk together. 
<story>Trainer-san, thank you very much for accompanying me.

data.text: When our schedules allow for it, let's take more walks together♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>When our schedules allow for it, let's take more walks together♪

data.text: Well then, I'll give it one more try……
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: Because it's a good work out, right?
Because it's a good work out, right?

data.processed: <story>Well then, I'll give it one more try……

data.text:
『To empathize is to know』…… to be able to understand without 
exchanging words, I'm in awe of your perceptiveness, Trainer-san.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>『To empathize is to know』…… to be able to understand without 
<story>exchanging words, I'm in awe of your perceptiveness, Trainer-san.

data.text: Next I'll clear it, so just watch me.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Next I'll clear it, so just watch me.

data.text: Hmmmm～…… it's not going very well is it……?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Hmmmm～…… it's not going very well is it……?

data.text:
Oh, are you seriously asking that? 
I haven't excercised enough yet, you know?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Oh, are you seriously asking that? 
<story>I haven't excercised enough yet, you know?

data.text:
And with that, I'll play another round, okay? 
This is for excercise, after all～.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>And with that, I'll play another round, okay? 
<story>This is for excercise, after all～.

data.text:
And so, the walk with Grass Wonder continued 
until she felt she could play the game well.
data.processed:
<story>And so, the walk with Grass Wonder continued 
<story>until she felt she could play the game well.
